keyMoments.title: Nami Awakens During Forced Wedding
keyMoments.description: Nami regains consciousness to find herself in a wedding dress as Absalom is about to kiss her to seal their forced marriage.
keyMoments.significance: This moment sets up Nami's emotional state and determination to fight back against Absalom.
keyMoments.quote: What?! A wedding?! Get away from me!

keyMoments.title: Nami Defeats Absalom with Thunder Charge
keyMoments.description: Furious at Absalom for hurting Lola, Nami charges her Perfect Clima-Tact and unleashes a devastating Thunder Charge Swing Arm attack, knocking out Absalom.
keyMoments.significance: This is a major victory for Nami, demonstrating her combat capabilities and her fierce loyalty to her friends.
keyMoments.quote: This is for my friend! Thunder Charge: Swing Arm!

abilities.description: Nami charges her Perfect Clima-Tact with high-voltage electricity and rotates it like an anemometer before delivering a powerful electrified strike to her opponent.

relationships.description: Lola risks herself to help Nami escape from Absalom, demonstrating a genuine friendship despite being a zombie.

evolutionMoments.description: Lola intervenes during Nami's forced wedding and takes a serious injury to protect her, proving the depth of their friendship.

reveals.information: Nami can use Thunder Charge: Swing Arm with her Perfect Clima-Tact

keyMoments.title: Absalom Attempts Forced Marriage
keyMoments.description: Absalom tries to seal his forced marriage to Nami with a kiss while she's unconscious, but she awakens just in time.
keyMoments.significance: This moment showcases Absalom's villainy and obsessive behavior toward Nami.

keyMoments.title: Absalom Attacks Lola
keyMoments.description: When Absalom realizes Lola's deception in helping Nami, he becomes enraged and fires an invisible bazooka blast at Lola.
keyMoments.significance: This brutal attack triggers Nami's anger and leads directly to his defeat.

keyMoments.title: Absalom Defeated by Nami
keyMoments.description: Absalom is knocked out by Nami's Thunder Charge: Swing Arm attack, ending the battle.
keyMoments.significance: This marks the end of Absalom's active role in the Thriller Bark arc. His previous injuries from Sanji weakened him enough for Nami's attack to finish him.

abilities.description: Using his Clear-Clear Fruit powers, Absalom fires an invisible bazooka blast at his opponents.

keyMoments.title: Lola Intervenes to Save Nami
keyMoments.description: Zombie Lola bursts into the wedding ceremony, pretending to be angry at Nami but actually creating a diversion to help her friend escape.
keyMoments.significance: This selfless act demonstrates that Lola's friendship with Nami is genuine despite being a zombie, showing that bonds transcend life and death in One Piece.
keyMoments.quote: Absalom! You should marry me instead of this lying woman!

keyMoments.title: Lola Injured Protecting Nami
keyMoments.description: When Absalom realizes Lola's deception, he fires an invisible bazooka blast at her, seriously injuring the zombie.
keyMoments.significance: Lola's sacrifice for Nami triggers the navigator's fury and determination to defeat Absalom, serving as the emotional catalyst for the battle's conclusion.

statusHistory.reason: Zombie animated by Gecko Moria using Charlotte Lola's shadow

relationships.description: Lola forms a genuine friendship with Nami and risks herself to protect her during the forced wedding.

evolutionMoments.description: Lola proves the depth of her friendship by taking a serious injury from Absalom while helping Nami escape.

keyMoments.title: Perona Wakes from Nightmare
keyMoments.description: Perona awakens from a traumatic nightmare about being surrounded by roaches and attacked by Usopp's 10-Ton Hammer, still shaken from her psychological defeat.
keyMoments.significance: This scene shows the lasting psychological impact of Usopp's victory, demonstrating that her defeat was more than physical - it broke her spirit.

keyMoments.title: Perona Plans to Steal the Thousand Sunny
keyMoments.description: After learning about Oars' rampage and the destruction of the mansion, Perona decides to abandon Thriller Bark and steal the Thousand Sunny along with all the treasure.
keyMoments.significance: This decision showcases Perona's self-preservation instinct and sets up her future encounter with Bartholomew Kuma.
keyMoments.quote: I'm getting out of here! I'll take their ship and all the treasure!

reveals.information: Perona is willing to abandon her allies when faced with danger, prioritizing self-preservation

keyMoments.title: Oars Searches for Missing Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: After defeating most of the Straw Hat Pirates, Oars goes searching for Nami, Luffy himself, and Sogeking, not knowing that Sogeking is actually Usopp.
keyMoments.significance: This scene highlights the irony of Oars searching for Luffy while possessing Luffy's shadow, and adds comedy through his failure to recognize Usopp's disguise.
keyMoments.quote: Where are Nami, Luffy, and that long-nosed guy Sogeking?

statusHistory.reason: Giant zombie animated by Gecko Moria using Luffy's shadow
